properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,METHOD ,CREATE_DT ,VIEW_CNT ,NVL(COUNT,0) COUNT ,TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'MM"월"DD"일" HH"시"MI"분"') END_TIME ,FILE_PATH||'/'||CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM (SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NO) COUNT, PRODUCT_NO FROM INTEREST GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN AUCTION USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_BNO) ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC) A) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,METHOD ,CREATE_DT ,VIEW_CNT ,NVL(COUNT,0) COUNT ,TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'MM"월"DD"일" HH"시"MI"분"') END_TIME ,FILE_PATH||'/'||CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM (SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NO) COUNT, PRODUCT_NO FROM INTEREST GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN AUCTION USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_BNO) ORDER BY (VIEW_CNT + COUNT * 15) DESC) A) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,METHOD ,CREATE_DT ,VIEW_CNT ,NVL(COUNT,0) COUNT ,TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'MM"월"DD"일" HH"시"MI"분"') END_TIME ,FILE_PATH||'/'||CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM (SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NO) COUNT, PRODUCT_NO FROM INTEREST GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN AUCTION USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_BNO) ORDER BY (AUCTION.END_TIME-SYSDATE) DESC) A) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
